description:
In the Midori mahjong parlor, Nangou is trying to pay off his debts by playing mahjong but  unfortunately, he`s losing badly. Just as the situation turns sour, a stranger wanders in on their game. After sharing a few wise words, Nangou is able to survive. This marks the beginning of a legend that will shake the underworld.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Genius that Flew Down into the Darkness
